European Court of Human Rights Watch

item.title: Formal Notice sent to U.S. Attorney Ismail Ramsey
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_1201_0800_ismail_ramsey_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 08, 2024, 12:01 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Ismail Ramsey (U.S. Attorney for the Northern District of California) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-08_1201_0800_ismail_ramsey_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Ramsey, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.S. Code § 4.

item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-06_1854_0800_nicole_argentieri_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 06, 2024, 18:54 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Nicole Argentieri (Acting Assistant Attorney General), Criminal Division of the U.S. Department of Justice Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-06_1854_0800_nicole_argentieri_Redacted.pdf Dear Ms. Argentieri, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
